name: Image Recognition VGG16
description: Recognizes what is being represented on an image using the VGG16 model, consisting of 1000 ImageNet labels.

parameters.name: image_name
parameters.description: The image name or URL. Can contain Tuktu strings

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: How many of the top-n predictions should be returned.

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: If set to true, only the best label is returned as string. Otherwise, the N best labels are returned as a list of (string, float) pairs, being the labels and their predictive scores.

parameters.name: local_remote
parameters.description: Whether the images are locally stored on disk ('local') or remotely on some URL ('remote'. Remote can also represent local files.
